channel.title: The tutorial and help guide?
channel.description: i made a server around 5 or 6 years ago and now i want to mess around with one for my own sense of enjoyment basically to start remembering things and the guide i used back then is not around anymore, could any point me in right direction to a basic guide of how to start up the client on my own computer and editing lists ect? i'd really appreciate it thanks.

item.title: The tutorial and help guide?
item.dc:creator: @stEps stEps
item.description:
@stEps wrote:

yes using easyrsc is your best option. Also, look around the web for some java youtube channels or something. Php is good learn too along with html, maybe css.

Read full topic

item.title: The tutorial and help guide?
item.dc:creator: @l0w_archer l0w archer
item.description:
@l0w_archer wrote:

if im honest guys i don’t know much of what to do ive forgot everything as i lost interest after server went dead when i couldnt afford to keep it up, im just looking at this as a hobby and learn everything myself, if i feel it becomes succesful i may release it but i don’t plan on it becoming the new best thing, just i have a lot of free time lately would be nice to learn something i enjoyed playing.

thansk for help guys really is appreciated

Read full topic

item.title: The tutorial and help guide?
item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

Nice to see you l0w, Yong mins guide is a start to learn the basics, if you want more advanced guides after that i’m afraid none have been really made.

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363007.0.html
